title: Setting up Nginx Reverse Proxy to Custom Domain
desc: Now that Code Server was up, I wanted to be able to access it from anywhere, so I used nginx to enable access from my custom domain

title: Setting up Code Server on Fedora Server
desc: After setting up Fedora Server once, I found that it was insufficient for running Code Server, so I had to re-do my installation with a couple of different steps

title: Setting up a Fedora Server
desc: I received back an old laptop from a mentee recently (he had gotten his own laptop) and decided that this would be a good opportunity to try my hand at some Linux Server administration

title: Re-writing my Telegram Bot in Golang
desc: I had originally written a Telegram Bot in Python 2, but seeing as Python 2 was sunsetted, I decided to re-write it in Golang as a way to learn the language

title: Adding a Markdown blog to my Vue + TS site
desc: I wanted to add a static, markdown-based blog component to my site, just for me to do write-ups on things I think are interesting enough for me to want to consolidate my knowledge on them and keep them around (not just in my head).
